DOC.brief_summary: A study to evaluate the effectiveness of an update of educational materials with respect to evaluation of monitoring of metabolic parameters
DOC.brief_title: EMR Data to Assess Monitoring of Patients Treated With Quetiapine
DOC.detailed_description: Objective assessment of metabolic monitoring in patients treated with Seroquel® or Seroquel® XR/quetiapine fumarate: use of IMS Disease Analyzer to assess physician behaviour in the UK and Germany
DOC.criteria: Electronic medical records of patients with diagnoses of schizophrenia, Bipolar Disorder (BPD) or Major Depressive Disorder (MDD) treated with Seroquel® or Seroquel®XR during the calendar periods: 13 Feb 31 Aug 2012 seen by GP & psychiatrists in Germany & 11 Jan31 July 2012 seen by GPs in the UK Patients with above mentioned diagnoses treated with Seroquel® or Seroquel® XR/quetiapine fumarate not having any medical encounters during the time periods: 13 Feb 31 Aug 2012 in Germany & 11 Jan31 July 2012 by GPs in the UK
